title: Trump/GM Factory Feud, Ohio Rep. Tim Ryan on 2020
itunes:title: Trump/GM Factory Feud, Ohio Rep. Tim Ryan on 2020
description:
Kevin discussed President Trump's political feud with GM and social media criticism after a shooter accused of killing 50 people in two mosques in New Zealand live-streamed the murders over the Internet with guests Emily Tisch Sussman, Democratic Strategist and Former VP of Campaigns for Center, and Terry Sullivan, Founding Partner at Firehouse Strategies Public Relations firm and former Marco Rubio presidential campaign manager.

Kevin also spoke with Ohio Democratic Congressman Tim Ryan who said GM’s decision to close a plant in his Ohio district is playing a part in his decision over whether to run for president in 2020.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
